bug.author: eedalong
bug.summary: Potential Bug in update_quantization_param() in QAT
bug.description: The code in update_quantization_param() only covers two device types CPU && GPU. But when device type is not any of these like <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pytorch/xla>XLA:GPU or XLA:CPU</denchmark-link> , bugs will be triggered. I wrote this bug ==, and this is fixed in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/nni/pull/3212>#3212</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/nni/pull/3211>#3211</denchmark-link> . Sorry for that QAQ
